tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name TEXT,
    variation_type TEXT,
    amino_acid_change TEXT,
    reference_genome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MutationAnalysis (
   analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   variation_id INT,
   patient_id INT,
   analysis_date DATE,
   analysis_result VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Variations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  position INT,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  impact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  sample_date DATE,
  tissue_type VARCHAR(50),
  quality VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Annotations (
  annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_id INT,
  annotation_text TEXT,
  annotator VARCHAR(100),
  annotation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE variations (
   variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   gene_name VARCHAR(50),
   mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
   mutation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name VARCHAR(50),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
   treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
   cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
   effectiveness VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE studies (
   study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   study_name VARCHAR(100),
   researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
   publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome_number INT,
  position INT,
  nucleotide_change VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE mutation_effects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_id INT,
  effect_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_score INT,
  phenotype VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (variation_id) REFERENCES genetic_variations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  study_type VARCHAR(50),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_id INT,
  population_name VARCHAR(100),
  allele_frequency FLOAT,
  sample_size INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (variation_id) REFERENCES genetic_variations(id)
);
